name: Green Brunei

short_desc: Youth empowerment and social innovation.

name: Care and Action for Strays (CAS)
short_desc: Animal rescue and adoption.

name: Persatuan KACA (Pusat Bahagia)
short_desc: Support services for disabled children.

name: Hand4HandBN
short_desc: community-driven NGO in Brunei that focuses on helping underprivileged families and frontliners through donation drives, charity events, and relief efforts, especially during festive seasons.

name: La Vida
short_desc: brunei-based non-profit that empowers families and individuals, especially those with special needs. Located in Kg Sungai Hanching, it provides education, start-up training, and community programs while fostering advocacy, inclusion, and volunteerism.

name: Majlis Belia Brunei
short_desc: Bruneiâ€™s national youth council, established in 1959 to represent and empower young people. It focuses on leadership, welfare, and youth development through programmes, events, and policy engagement, serving as the main platform for youth voices in the country.

name: Majlis Kesejahteraan Masyarakat
short_desc: Brunei NGO that helps underprivileged families, children, elderly, and persons with disabilities through food aid, education support, and welfare programs.

name: Persatuan KESAN
short_desc: a registered youth NGO in Brunei dedicated to leadership development, character building, and volunteerism.

name: Special Olympics Brunei
short_desc: Sports & inclusion for intellectual disability

name: Projek Bina Ukhwah
short_desc: a youth-led initiative in Brunei founded in 2017 that supports underprivileged families through community service, livelihood training, home improvement, and disaster relief.

name: YASKA (Children's Cancer Foundation)
short_desc: Support children diagnosed with cancer and families

name: ABLE (Down Syndrome Association)
short_desc: Support for individuals with Down Syndrome

name: Brunei Darussalam AIDS Council (BDAC)
short_desc: At Brunei Darussalam AIDS Council (BDAIDSCOUNCIL) we aim to educate the public about HIV & AIDS related issues in order to be well informed and live a healthier lifestyle.

name: WeCareBN
short_desc: Brunei-based NGO founded in 2016 that provides humanitarian and poverty relief.

name: Brunei Darussalam National Association of the Blind
short_desc: a non-profit established in 2001 to empower blind and visually impaired people in Brunei.

name: Learning Ladders
short_desc: a Brunei non-profit dedicated to supporting children with autism and developmental delays.

name: Pusat Ehsan
short_desc: a non-profit charitable organization in Brunei that provides education, training, and rehabilitation for people with special needs, aiming to empower them for independent and inclusive living.

name: BruWILD
short_desc: a registered NGO founded in 2013 that focuses on biodiversity conservation, wildlife rescue, and environmental education in Brunei Darussalam.

name: HEART Volunteers Group
short_desc: a volunteer-driven NGO in Brunei focused on providing emergency relief during crises and disasters

name: Young Southeast Asian Leaders Initiative (YSEALI)
short_desc: a U.S.-backed initiative that develops leadership skills among Southeast Asian youth, including Bruneians, through fellowships, workshops, and grants in areas like civic engagement, environment, education, and economic empowerment.
